mapper.sql: id, bean_name, method_name, params, cron_expression, status, remark, crt_time, crt_user, crt_name,script_id,user_id
mapper.insert:
insert into schedule_job
bean_name,
method_name,
params,
cron_expression,
status,
remark,
crt_time,
crt_user,
crt_name,
script_id,
user_id,
#{beanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update schedule_job
bean_name = #{beanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method_name = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
params = #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cron_expression = #{cronExpression,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
crt_time = #{crtTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
crt_user = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
crt_name = #{crtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
script_id = #{scriptId,jdbcType=TINYINT},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete:
delete from schedule_job where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT tm3.id,tm3.cron,tm3.status,tm3.createTime,tm3.description,tm3.typeId,tm3.userName,tm3.projectName,tm3.scriptName,tm3.scriptId,tm3.projectId,eu.`name` as createName FROM (select sj.id,sj.user_id,sj.cron_expression as cron,sj.`status`,DATE_FORMAT(sj.crt_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime,sj.remark as description,tm2.typeId,tm2.userName,tm2.projectName,tm2.scriptName,tm2.scriptId ,tm2.projectId FROM schedule_job sj join (select tm1.scriptId,tm1.scriptName,tm1.userName,tm1.projectName,ep.type as typeId,ep.id as projectId FROM (SELECT es.id as scriptId,es.`name` as scriptName,eu.name as userName,es.name as projectName,es.project_id FROM entity_script es join entity_user eu on es.user_id=eu.id) tm1 join entity_project ep on tm1.project_id=ep.id) tm2 on tm2.scriptId=sj.script_id) tm3 JOIN entity_user eu on tm3.user_id=eu.id; ORDER BY createTime DESC
